title: Steam Deck is a glorious mess
description: The Steam Deck is a Linux handheld gaming PC that runs Windows games like a Nintendo Switch, and its damn good at it  when it works. But the half-baked console gave us a lot of trouble, and we dont review gadgets on promise!  Heres why Sean Hollister thinks its more like an OG Game Boy than a Nintendo Switch, transformative despite not yet meeting its potential.
